channel.title: RS2 Hacking Polls
channel.description:
Now that you are the elite of the community, you get to decide who also deserves that status!
Create new polls who you think should have access to the board and let others vote. The result will reflect their position in the community.
They must have at least 50 rep before they can be nominated, otherwise they should have knowledge of the runescape client or some other specialized knowledge to allow them to significantly contribute to the discussion going on in the board.
Any comments, post them here I suppose, thanks.

item.title: RS2 Hacking Polls
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

The Moparscape Vet section requires quite a large majority. Generally speaking, if there isn’t at least twice as many yes votes than no votes then the person won’t get in.

Noteworthy, of course, is that the people who vote their generally know how to vote. They know what qualities they’re after and they inform others of the reasoning for their vote (regardless of whether it’s yes or no).

Read full topic

item.title: RS2 Hacking Polls
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

i know you are only posting that many links to wikipedia to goad me, but you are a genuine idiot

im sure this will be like it is for other sections, a clear majority after a random amount of time. basically up to an administrator

Read full topic

item.title: RS2 Hacking Polls
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

by how big of a majority do they need to get in? first-past-the-post? 2/3 majority? 3/4 majority?

After doing some reading, I support a 3/4 majority needed.

The composition and powers of the Senate are established by Article One of the United States Constitution. The Senate is composed of senators, each of whom represents a single state in its entirety, with each state being equally represented by two senators, regard...
